/metadata.summary: Access to the Server's Capability Statement
/metadata.description: All FHIR Servers return a CapabilityStatement that describes what services they perform

/Basic.summary: Manager for resources of type Basic
/Basic.description: The Manager for resources of type Basic: provides services to manage the collection of all the Basic instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type Basic based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

parameters.name: _profile
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given profile

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given security labels

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: actionGuidanceForReference
parameters.description: Action guidance for reference

parameters.name: actionGuidanceForType
parameters.description: The action guidance for type

parameters.name: actionGuidanceType
parameters.description: The action guidance type

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: A use context assigned to the action guidance

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: A type of use context assigned to the action guidance

parameters.name: context-type-value
parameters.description: A use context type and value assigned to the action guidance

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The identifier

parameters.name: intendedAudience
parameters.description: The intended audience

parameters.name: recommendation
parameters.description: The recommendation

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: The modifier reference

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The modifier role

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status

parameters.name: viewForReference
parameters.description: View for reference

parameters.name: viewForType
parameters.description: The view for type

parameters.name: viewType
parameters.description: The view type

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

/Basic/{rid}.summary: Read/Write/etc resource instance of type Basic
/Basic/{rid}.description: Access to services to manage the state of a single resource of type Basic

get.summary: Read the current state of the resource

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

put.summary: Update the current state of the resource

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

/Basic/{rid}/_history/{hid}.summary: Read a past version of resource instance of type Basic
/Basic/{rid}/_history/{hid}.description: Access a to specified previous version of a single resource of type Basic

/StructureDefinition.summary: Manager for resources of type StructureDefinition
/StructureDefinition.description: The Manager for resources of type StructureDefinition: provides services to manage the collection of all the StructureDefinition instances

get.summary: Search all resources of type StructureDefinition based on a set of criteria

parameters.name: _content
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a fulltext search

parameters.name: _filter
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's data using a filter

parameters.name: _has
parameters.description: Return resources linked to by the given target

parameters.name: _id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource

parameters.name: _language
parameters.description: The language of the resource

parameters.name: _lastUpdated
parameters.description: Only return resources which were last updated as specified by the given range

parameters.name: _profile
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given profile

parameters.name: _security
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given security labels

parameters.name: _source
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given source value (Resource.meta.source)

parameters.name: _tag
parameters.description: Search for resources which have the given tag

parameters.name: _text
parameters.description: Search the contents of the resource's narrative using a fulltext search

parameters.name: abstract
parameters.description: Whether the structure is abstract

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: Definition that this type is constrained/specialized from

parameters.name: base-path
parameters.description: Path that identifies the base element

parameters.name: context-type
parameters.description: resource | datatype | extension

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The structure definition publication date

parameters.name: derivation
parameters.description: specialization | constraint - How relates to base definition

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the structure definition

parameters.name: experimental
parameters.description: For testing purposes, not real usage

parameters.name: ext-context
parameters.description: Where the extension can be used in instances

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: External identifier for the structure definition

parameters.name: jurisdiction
parameters.description: Intended jurisdiction for the structure definition

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: A code for the profile

parameters.name: kind
parameters.description: primitive-type | complex-type | resource | logical

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Computationally friendly name of the structure definition

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: A path that is constrained in the profile

parameters.name: publisher
parameters.description: Name of the publisher of the structure definition

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The current status of the structure definition

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The human-friendly name of the structure definition

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type defined or constrained by this structure

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The uri that identifies the structure definition

parameters.name: valueset
parameters.description: A vocabulary binding reference

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The business version of the structure definition

requestBody.description: The new state of the resource

200.description: the resource being returned after being updated

ETag.description: Version from Resource.meta.version as a weak ETag

summary.name: _summary
summary.description: Requests the server to return a designated subset of the resource

format.name: _format
format.description: Specify alternative response formats by their MIME-types (when a client is unable acccess accept: header)

pretty.name: _pretty
pretty.description: Ask for a pretty printed response for human convenience

elements.name: _elements
elements.description: Requests the server to return a collection of elements from the resource

count.name: _count
count.description: The maximum number of search results on a page. The server is not bound to return the number requested, but cannot return more
